Children.Text: Please double click a snippet to load...
Setup the snippet directory and download the demo assets & snippet data.

Children.Tooltip: Open the snippet directory in the OS file browser

Children.Help: The location where you want to store the snippets.
The name that is used when you create snippets. Make it your HISE user forum name for increased karma!
Whether to sort the snippets in the list based on their priority or alphabetically
Untick this if you don't want to download the snippets (most likely because you've setup the target folder as Git repository already).
Untick this if you don't want to download the example assets (about 50MB)
Select the filename for the snippet. It will save a markdown file with the snippet data and the supplied metadata.

Children.Help: This will be used to sort the snippets in the browser. Pick a value between 1 (low priority for edge case snippets) to 5 for the most important examples that should appear at the top.
